page.title: 14Cinderella Farm
page.content:
{Cinderella Farm,}plant their crops between winter and May. The crops they grow are{strawberries and raspberries which when ripe, they pay people to pick, so that they can sell them to markets. They also make some of them into raspberry or strawberry jam for people who come to their little shop and buy them. Sometimes they sell strawberries in punnets so people can take them home and eat them for tea.
Their land covers nine acres. The crops start to fruit between May and August when they are ready to pick. A long time ago{Cinderella Farm}didn't grow crops, instead they kept animals such as sheep, cows, chickens and pigs and when they were old they used to kill them and sell their meat for money.
